alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Kearney; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 7:37PM CDT until April 18 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Webster County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Adams County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Franklin, or 31 miles southeast of Holdrege, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Upland, Campbell and Bladen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
